utterances.speaker: Mary
utterances.text: Hi Jack.  What are you doing?

utterances.speaker: Jack
utterances.text: Hi Mary.  I'm filling out a job application.

utterances.speaker: Mary
utterances.text: Are you finished with school already?

utterances.speaker: Jack
utterances.text: No.  I have one more semester, but it would be great to have a job lined up.

utterances.speaker: Jack
utterances.text: Quite busy.  I'm preparing for my presentation tomorrow on our marketing strategy.  I'm not even half done yet.

utterances.speaker: Mary
utterances.text: You must feel stressed out now.

utterances.speaker: Jack
utterances.text: I'm playing pool with my friends at a pool hall.

utterances.speaker: Mary
utterances.text: I didn't know you play pool.  Are you having fun?

utterances.speaker: Jack
utterances.text: I'm having a great time.  How about you?  What are you doing?

utterances.speaker: Mary
utterances.text: I'm taking a break from my homework.  There seems to be no end to the amount of work I have to do.

utterances.speaker: Jack
utterances.text: I'm glad I'm not in your shoes.
